cn.description:
我们的应用实时连接到YouTube，让您播放任何视频，并拥有专为您设计的独家功能！

尽情探索、播放并享受您喜爱的内容——无干扰！

特别功能
浮动播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他应用时继续观看视频。
只需进入全屏模式，点击画中画按钮——它是播放器顶部的第二个图标。
无论打开哪个应用，您的视频都会浮动在屏幕顶部！

锁屏播放
无中断收听！
即使屏幕关闭，也能继续享受视频音频。非常适合开车或休息时听音乐、播客或喜欢的曲目。

只需锁定设备屏幕，即刻会看到后台播放器。

睡眠定时器
安然入睡——应用会自动停止！
启用此功能后，视频将在您设定的时间后自动停止。非常适合睡觉或小憩，无需担心忘记关闭。
如何激活？
点击定时器按钮，选择运行时间，就完成了。
放松，剩下的交给应用！

循环模式
反复播放您喜欢的视频！

cn.description:
App Store专供、精心设计、功能强大、iPad量身定做 - Inspire Pro为您提供令人难以置信的快速逼真绘画体验，让您随时随地记录灵感。

我们独有的绘画引擎Sorcery™充分利用GPU的性能，以炫丽的64位色彩、激光般锐利的子像素精度和极快速度来渲染画笔的笔触。本身已很精美的湿油画笔笔触，加上干画笔的惊人混合效果绝对会惊艳到您。轻压并涂抹画布即可为您的作品添加淡柔模糊效果，而用力按压则可将画布上的颜色混合，创造出新的色彩。

无论您是初学者、专业画家或是介于二者之间的阶段，这款最直观而令人惊叹的iPad插画应用Inspire Pro的简单性和强大功能都将令您乐在其中。

画笔
• 150种分为15组供您选用的高品质画笔：油漆、气笔、喷漆、泼漆、石墨铅笔、蜡笔、马克笔、粉笔、炭笔、粉彩和孔泰笔、基本图形、复杂图形、形状轮廓、图案和纹理
• 所有画笔均可用作湿画笔，干画笔（混合）或橡皮擦
• 超过20种不同的配置赋予画笔笔触强大的多功能性和变化性

绘画
• Sorcery™，App Store上最快的64位绘画引擎
• 功能完备的Apple Pencil支持压力、倾斜角度、方向和双击
• Smart Keyboard支持超过20个上下文敏感型键盘快捷键
• 可创建任意尺寸画布，iPad Pro上可大至16K (64MP)
• 双纹理画笔
• 64位颜色
• 时刻支持所有设备方向 - 轻松切换横竖屏绘画
• 多达1000级的撤消和重做功能
• 无需打开菜单，触摸和滑动热点即可快速更改画笔大小、不透明度和压力
• 可利用吸管工具通过触摸和保持手势从画布中选择绘画颜色
• 画布可以移动，旋转和放大（可放大至6400％）

画布回放视频录制
• 绘画时自动记录画笔笔触而无任何延迟
• 您可以直接在图库中逐笔播放您正在创建的作品视频
• 画布回放视频可以导出到您的照片或任何其他地方
• 导出的视频拥有高品质HD画质，分辨率最高可达1080p

颜色选择器
• 使用直观的颜色选择器选择您可以想象到的任何绘画颜色
• HSB和RGB滑块搭配一个大色轮，色块和不透明度滑块
• 在绘画时，您上一次使用的颜色会自动保存到调色板中
• 您也可以通过拖放将您喜爱的颜色保存到调色板中

访问snowCanoe.com查看更多的屏幕快照，视频和作品。

cn.description:
黄鸭证件照， 小红书博主推荐，抖音超热门证件照APP，求职求学必备！

为什么选择黄鸭证件照？

一次付费下载，永久使用，还可设置分享给朋友家人（依照iCloud家庭账户规则）

“一款功能强大的证件照制作软件，用户可免费保存无水印电子证件照到手机相册，还有众多实用小工具功能等你探索。”

===百种证件照尺寸，够专业===

包含1寸、2寸、3寸、4寸等常规尺寸，同时提供百余种官方指定证照规格，如：毕业照、学位照、入学照等学生证照；会计、考研、计算机、公务员、医护、考研、幼师及语言类考试证照；还有社保、签证、简历、驾照等其他类满足您的各类拍摄场景需求。软件智能推出当下热门的证件照尺寸，让你更快捷高效的用手机制作证件照！

===一键抠图换背景，够智能===

发丝级抠图引擎，ps小白的福音！傻瓜式操作智能抠图，配合多元化背景底色，除了常规红蓝白，还增加高级色和糖果色，可根据不同的使用场景随意切换。展现你最美气质的同时，确保证件照的专业合规性，一图多用不是梦，旧图改造还能用！

===超自然美颜美妆，够高级===

AI智能算法提供磨皮、美白、瘦脸、等美颜功能。更有适合懒人、手残党的一键式化妆，满足你对自然妆、男神妆、女神妆的需求，支持自定义妆容程度。一键还原最美且真实的你，打造完美、自然、高级感脸庞，告别证照不美时代！

===海量服饰在线换，够正式===

不同风格的男装、女装、童装，满足多种场景需求的同时，支持自助调节服饰大小和位置，搭配消除笔调整细节，效果简直完美！

cn.description:
「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

hk.description:
於 App Store 獨家上架，針對 iPad 量身打造，精心設計，提供強大功能 - Inspire Pro 可提供極速逼真的繪畫、繪圖與素描體驗，讓您隨身攜帶並於靈感迸發時，隨時隨地進行創作。

我們的專利繪圖引擎 Sorcery™ 充分運用 GPU 效能，讓筆觸擁有絢爛的 64 位元色彩、雷射般銳利的子像素精細度和極致高速。 濕潤的油畫筆觸看起來很漂亮，而幹筆劃驚人的混合效果同樣會完全讓你驚嘆。稍用一點力塗抹畫布，爲您的作品添加微妙的模糊效果，或者再用大點力將畫布上現有的顔色混合在一起，創造出新的色彩。 

不論是新秀藝術家、經驗豐富的專業人士或處於兩者之間的藝術工作者，皆可享有 iPad 上最直觀迷人之繪圖應用程式 Inspire Pro 的簡潔設計和強大功能。

畫筆
• 共有 150 種優質筆刷可供選擇 (分為 15 組)：油畫、噴槍、噴漆、顏料潑濺、石墨鉛筆、蠟筆、麥克筆、粉筆、炭筆、粉彩筆和炭精筆、基本圖形、複雜圖形、圖形外框、圖樣和紋理
• 所有畫筆均可用作濕刷、幹刷（混合）或擦除器
• 超過20種不同的背景可用于定制畫筆筆觸，功能强大、變化多樣。

油畫
• Sorcery™，App Store上最快的64位噴漆引擎
• 完整支援 Apple Pencil 壓力、傾斜角度、方向和雙擊功能
• 支援 Smart Keyboard，並提供 20 多組依使用情境而定的鍵盤快捷鍵
• 在iPad Pro上可創建尺寸最大爲16K（64MP）的畫布
• 雙紋理刷
• 64位彩色
• 始終支持所有設備情况 - 輕鬆地從人像切換到風景畫
• 可1000級撤消和重做
• 觸摸和滑動熱點可用于快速更改畫筆大小、不透明度和壓力，而無需打開菜單
• 可長按吸管工具，從畫布中選擇塗料顔色
• 畫布可以移動、旋轉和放大，最多可達6400％

畫布回放視頻錄製
• 自動記錄筆觸效果，隨時繪製
• 您可以直接在作品庫中播放你一筆一筆作畫的視頻
• 畫布回放視頻可以導出到您的照片或任何其他目的地
• 導出的視頻是高品質高清晰度的，分辨率高達1080p

拾色器
• 使用直觀的拾色器，選擇您喜歡的任何塗料顔色
• HSB（色調-飽和度-亮度）和RGB（紅綠藍）滑塊，伴隨著一個大色環、彩色方塊和不透明滑塊
• 在繪畫時，您最近使用的顔色會自動保存到調色板中
• 您還可以通過拖放將您喜愛的顔色保存到調色板中

訪問snowCanoe.com 查看更多截圖、視頻和圖稿。

STEP UP TO THE PLATE
Relive the second baseball game in the Backyard Sports franchise, now enhanced to run on iOS. Whether you're picking your dream team, playing a pick-up game, or diving into a full season, step up to the plate and experience the game that made baseball fun for everyone!

Backyard Baseball ‘01 teams up the Backyard kids with Backyardified MLB legends. Create your own Backyard team, customize your uniforms, and strategize to win the Championship. Play a single pick-up game or play through an entire season. Backyard Baseball ‘01 features intuitive controls for all ages!

SWING BACK INTO BASEBALL
Enjoy baseball like it’s 2001!
30 Charming Backyard kids
Legendary MLB Players
MLB Team Marks
Hilarious Bloopers
8 Classic Ballparks
9 Pitching Power-ups and 4 batting Power-ups
Lively commentary from Sunny Day and Vinnie

To get into the swing of things, choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit the ball!

THE GOAT RETURNS
Play with the legend himself, Pablo Sanchez. Build a roster from a cast of 30 hilarious child athletes and 28 legendary pros that made Backyard Baseball ‘01 a sports classic. Returning MLB players include Derek Jeter, Alex Rodriguez, Cal Ripken Jr., Sammy Sosa, Mike Piazza, Randy Johnson, Nomar Garciaparra, Jeff Bagwell, Jason Giambi, Chipper Jones, Jeromy Burnitz, Mark McGwire, Shawn Green, Vladimir Guerrero, Kenny Lofton, Jason Kendall, Barry Larkin, Marty Cordova, Mo Vaughn, Raul Mondesi, Curt Schilling, Alex Gonzalez, Juan Gonzalez, Larry Walker, Carlos Beltran, Tony Gwynn, Ivan Rodriguez, and Jose Canseco.

Game Modes include:
Choose from three modes of play (Easy Mode, Medium Mode, Hard Mode)
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer choosing players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You pick your home field, create a team, and manage the team through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season, the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). If you keep winning, you’ll compete in the Super Entire Nation Tournament and Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series!

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. As an example, we can’t use the original 32bit code to support modern macOS, as even with an incredibly clever wrapper, macOS can’t execute the binaries.

Backyard Baseball ‘01 runs well, looks better than ever, includes new bonus features to test your mettle, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

hk.description:
「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

建造亮麗的江戶之城。
配置城堡和小巷，建立出大氣的城下町吧！

增加代表商店和居民經濟價值的『俸祿』，爭取成為日本第一的大名吧。

發展的秘訣在於將契合度好的建築物建在一起，例如『蕎麥麵店＋天婦羅店』、『地藏菩薩＋帽傘店』等。

建造客棧後，歷史上的名人也許會在『各國漫遊之旅』、『驅鬼之旅』、『寺子屋修學旅行』中前來參觀。

開闢江戶未來的也許就是正在瀏覽介紹的你！！
----
其它遊戲請透過關鍵字「Kairosoft」來進行搜索。https://kairopark.jp
還有支援移動設備/電腦的遊戲發展國物語等免費遊戲哦。

戰國時代的忍者戰爭遊戲！！
是一款發展忍者村，進而一統天下的模擬類遊戲。

忍者村的村民（真實身份為忍者）們會向來訪的旅客兜售自製的商品以及從村裡採集到的木材和礦石來賺錢。賺來的錢可以作為軍費，用於村民的修行或是增強裝備和兵力，所以請好好經營村莊哦。

村民透過不斷修行可以學會各式各樣的技能，讓他們裝備上武器和鎧甲……
然後就去打開戰鬥的序幕吧。

還有可能遇到歷史名將！？
----
其它遊戲請透過關鍵字「Kairosoft」來進行搜索。https://kairopark.jp
還有支援移動設備/電腦的遊戲發展國物語等免費遊戲哦。

出發前往草原、寒冷地帶、叢林等地去探險，尋找動物！
來經營一座讓各種動物都能舒適生活，大受歡迎的動物園吧！

首日開張就馬上讓客人因可愛的動物而笑容滿面。
餵食肚子餓的動物，照顧牠們吧。

送禮物給還有點緊張的動物來增進彼此的感情應該也不錯喔。
依照動物的生態來選擇要送牠蘋果、樹果或肉類吧。
要是養殖場內的植物設置也能夠配合動物的生活環境就更棒了！

也別忘了讓客人逛得舒適喔！
若是有長椅和休息區域，再加上熱狗販售店的話就能讓客人玩到太陽下山了吧。
當動物園的區域變大後，引入園區巴士來讓移動變得更輕鬆！

當同一個養殖場內的動物彼此感情變好就會萌生戀情……還可能生下小孩子唷！
如果養殖場內只有雄性的話，就藉由探險或介紹所來幫牠們尋找雌性的夥伴吧。
動物可以透過緊張的雇用交涉而成為夥伴，要幫牠取一個專屬的名字喔。

於SNS上也大受世界矚目！來吧，靠你的經營技巧來朝五星級動物園邁進吧！

輕觸、拖曳、放大與縮小等操作方式皆可對應。

更多遊戲請搜尋「Kairosoft」。https://kairopark.jp
這裡有許多您可能玩過的免費遊戲，也有大量買斷制應用程式！
都是2D點陣圖風格的Kairosoft系列遊戲喔。

hk.description:
來打造充滿笑容與回憶的美好遊樂園吧！
首先要建造「旋轉咖啡杯」及「彈跳床」等設施來招攬遊客。再來招募人氣吉祥物並加以培育，讓他們參加盛裝遊行吧。

來訪的遊客或許會在社群網路平台上發表感想喔。
參考對遊樂園的感想或期望，並活用在經營上吧。
其中說不定會有因為看了知名評論家的感想而來訪的遊客喔？
想建造更多遊樂設施，就需要有土地。
盡情外包工程來擴大土地吧。
或許有朝一日，興建「摩天輪」及「雲霄飛車」等巨大遊樂設施也不是夢喔？
另外，整修交通機關可以讓遠方的遊客也來參訪。

而遊樂園最不可或缺的，就是身為門面的吉祥物。
透過每年一次的獲得交涉，來招募理想的吉祥物吧。
只要獲得新吉祥物，就會開放建造「雪國區」或「宇宙區」、「沙漠區」等符合吉祥物氛圍的遊樂區。如果人氣夠高，在參加盛裝遊行時，也會讓遊客滿意。

遊客滿足時就會累積點數，可以將此點數用在研究設施等指令上。
強化遊樂設施的人氣與性能來創造粉絲，並登上全國遊樂園排行榜吧。
要在遼闊土地上打造出怎樣的遊樂園，都在您一念之間！

一起來經營充滿許多遊客的夢幻主題遊樂園吧！

這是大幅強化後的升級版，新增了在自己公司內部開發遊戲機的功能以及轉職系統。

找尋優秀職員並對他們進行培養吧。

hk.description:
來經營專屬於你的滑冰場吧。
還可以培育員工參加競技賽喔。

首先你要準備一個大型滑冰場來吸引客人。
在滑冰場上布置一些裝飾品增添魅力，讓大家不禁想要多拍幾張照。
設置「三溫暖」療癒身心；設置「熱湯吧」用熱湯紓解疲憊。
客人的迴響有時也會發上社群喔！

「要是有這種菜色就好了」
積極回應客人的要求吧！
你可以搭配各種材料開發出你的原創菜色。
運動後送上一頓美食，客人也會笑容滿面。

指導員的培育也很重要。
「旋轉」、「艾克索跳」……學會各種技巧後，
再編組一套最能發揮實力的演出節目去挑戰競技賽吧！
得到優勝的話，滑冰場的評價肯定也會跟著水漲船高！

打開知名度後，其他城鎮的鎮長也聞風而來。
這時就可以把滑冰場遷往更好的地點，吸引全世界的人來多多光顧囉！

來吧，一起打造五星滑冰場，讓客人們留下深刻回憶吧！

我們的應用實時連接到YouTube，讓您播放任何視頻，並擁有專為您設計的獨家功能！
主要功能亮點：

mo.releaseNotes: 此更新包含一些錯誤修正與改進，以求持續改善應用程式，維持高品質。
mo.description:
於 App Store 獨家上架，針對 iPad 量身打造，精心設計，提供強大功能 - Inspire Pro 可提供極速逼真的繪畫、繪圖與素描體驗，讓您隨身攜帶並於靈感迸發時，隨時隨地進行創作。

我們的專利繪圖引擎 Sorcery™ 充分運用 GPU 效能，讓筆觸擁有絢爛的 64 位元色彩、雷射般銳利的子像素精細度和極致高速。 濕潤的油畫筆觸看起來很漂亮，而幹筆劃驚人的混合效果同樣會完全讓你驚嘆。稍用一點力塗抹畫布，爲您的作品添加微妙的模糊效果，或者再用大點力將畫布上現有的顔色混合在一起，創造出新的色彩。 

不論是新秀藝術家、經驗豐富的專業人士或處於兩者之間的藝術工作者，皆可享有 iPad 上最直觀迷人之繪圖應用程式 Inspire Pro 的簡潔設計和強大功能。

畫筆
• 共有 150 種優質筆刷可供選擇 (分為 15 組)：油畫、噴槍、噴漆、顏料潑濺、石墨鉛筆、蠟筆、麥克筆、粉筆、炭筆、粉彩筆和炭精筆、基本圖形、複雜圖形、圖形外框、圖樣和紋理
• 所有畫筆均可用作濕刷、幹刷（混合）或擦除器
• 超過20種不同的背景可用于定制畫筆筆觸，功能强大、變化多樣。

油畫
• Sorcery™，App Store上最快的64位噴漆引擎
• 完整支援 Apple Pencil 壓力、傾斜角度、方向和雙擊功能
• 支援 Smart Keyboard，並提供 20 多組依使用情境而定的鍵盤快捷鍵
• 在iPad Pro上可創建尺寸最大爲16K（64MP）的畫布
• 雙紋理刷
• 64位彩色
• 始終支持所有設備情况 - 輕鬆地從人像切換到風景畫
• 可1000級撤消和重做
• 觸摸和滑動熱點可用于快速更改畫筆大小、不透明度和壓力，而無需打開菜單
• 可長按吸管工具，從畫布中選擇塗料顔色
• 畫布可以移動、旋轉和放大，最多可達6400％

畫布回放視頻錄製
• 自動記錄筆觸效果，隨時繪製
• 您可以直接在作品庫中播放你一筆一筆作畫的視頻
• 畫布回放視頻可以導出到您的照片或任何其他目的地
• 導出的視頻是高品質高清晰度的，分辨率高達1080p

拾色器
• 使用直觀的拾色器，選擇您喜歡的任何塗料顔色
• HSB（色調-飽和度-亮度）和RGB（紅綠藍）滑塊，伴隨著一個大色環、彩色方塊和不透明滑塊
• 在繪畫時，您最近使用的顔色會自動保存到調色板中
• 您還可以通過拖放將您喜愛的顔色保存到調色板中

訪問snowCanoe.com 查看更多截圖、視頻和圖稿。

mo.trackName: ATracker PRO - 每日時間管理
mo.releaseNotes:
-- 修復歷史標籤中匯出功能的錯誤
-- 即時活動介面更改
-- 各種錯誤修復
mo.description:
生命是寶貴的，你的時間也是如此。 ATracker幫助你記錄你的時間。

ATracker是一款時間記錄APP，非常易于使用，只需要很少的設定。它支援：一鍵啟動/停止時間記錄;條形圖或餅圖顯示您的時間去向;完全可定制的用戶界面;用標簽對任務進行分類;CSV和PDF資料匯出;在多個設備之間同步資料;通過Apple Watch，Widget和Siri開始/停止記錄。
這是一個全新的方式來組織你的一天。

范圍
ATracker是一種干凈簡約的追蹤方式：
 - 工作中的不同任務和專案
 - 學校研究和專案
 - 健身
 - 社交
 - 家庭作業
 - 嬰兒或兒童日常活動
 - 業余愛好專案
 - 或任何人們想要記錄和時間管理的活動

功能特色:
 - 只需輕按一下即可開始和停止記錄任務。
 - 今日的時間使用概覽。
 - 目標系統。
 - 完整的活動日志。專案歷史記錄。添加錯過或修改現有的時間記錄。
 - 自定義活動，有數百個圖標可供選擇。您還可以對任務設定顏色。
 - 柱狀圖和餅型圖報告。
 - 按標簽分組任務，并允許用戶按今日標簽上的標記過濾任務，以及在報告中顯示持續時間或次數。
 - 任務記時即使在設備關閉時仍然工作。
 - 任務定時. 鬧鈴即使在套用關閉狀態仍然會響
 - 手勢支援
 - 小部件
 -  Apple Watch支援
 -  Siri快捷方式
 - iPad支援Split View和Slide Over的多任務支援。
 - 使用PDF和CSV檔案匯出資料。
 - 能夠為每個任務條目記錄文本注釋。
 - 完全自定義具有更多外觀的UI，并允許用戶使用自己的圖片作為背景。

WEB訂閱
通過Web訂閱，ATracker支援跨多個設備進行同步。除App外，它還提供對ATracker服務的Web訪問。此附加組件是可選的。
在套用內購買的 ATracker 服務會依照您的套餐每月或每年續訂。套餐價格可能會因國家/地區而異。
 - 費用將在確認購買時向您的iTunes賬號收取
 - 您的訂閱會自動更新，除非您在已付費期間結束前至少24小時關閉自動更新
 -  您的賬號會在已付費期間結束前24小時內被再次收費
 -  您可以在購買后前往賬號設定管理訂閱并關閉自動更新
 -  您無法在已付費期間內取消購買
 - 如果您的試用還未結束，剩余的天數在您開始訂閱后會自動失效

APP支援
訪問https://support.wonderapps.se或通過support@wonderapps.se與我們聯系
服務條款：https://atracker.pro/atracker_TOS.html
隱私政策：https://atracker.pro/atracker_policy.html

mo.description:
STEP UP TO THE PLATE
Relive the second baseball game in the Backyard Sports franchise, now enhanced to run on iOS. Whether you're picking your dream team, playing a pick-up game, or diving into a full season, step up to the plate and experience the game that made baseball fun for everyone!

Backyard Baseball ‘01 teams up the Backyard kids with Backyardified MLB legends. Create your own Backyard team, customize your uniforms, and strategize to win the Championship. Play a single pick-up game or play through an entire season. Backyard Baseball ‘01 features intuitive controls for all ages!

SWING BACK INTO BASEBALL
Enjoy baseball like it’s 2001!
30 Charming Backyard kids
Legendary MLB Players
MLB Team Marks
Hilarious Bloopers
8 Classic Ballparks
9 Pitching Power-ups and 4 batting Power-ups
Lively commentary from Sunny Day and Vinnie

To get into the swing of things, choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit the ball!

THE GOAT RETURNS
Play with the legend himself, Pablo Sanchez. Build a roster from a cast of 30 hilarious child athletes and 28 legendary pros that made Backyard Baseball ‘01 a sports classic. Returning MLB players include Derek Jeter, Alex Rodriguez, Cal Ripken Jr., Sammy Sosa, Mike Piazza, Randy Johnson, Nomar Garciaparra, Jeff Bagwell, Jason Giambi, Chipper Jones, Jeromy Burnitz, Mark McGwire, Shawn Green, Vladimir Guerrero, Kenny Lofton, Jason Kendall, Barry Larkin, Marty Cordova, Mo Vaughn, Raul Mondesi, Curt Schilling, Alex Gonzalez, Juan Gonzalez, Larry Walker, Carlos Beltran, Tony Gwynn, Ivan Rodriguez, and Jose Canseco.

Game Modes include:
Choose from three modes of play (Easy Mode, Medium Mode, Hard Mode)
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer choosing players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You pick your home field, create a team, and manage the team through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season, the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). If you keep winning, you’ll compete in the Super Entire Nation Tournament and Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series!

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. As an example, we can’t use the original 32bit code to support modern macOS, as even with an incredibly clever wrapper, macOS can’t execute the binaries.

Backyard Baseball ‘01 runs well, looks better than ever, includes new bonus features to test your mettle, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

mo.description:
「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

建造亮麗的江戶之城。
配置城堡和小巷，建立出大氣的城下町吧！

增加代表商店和居民經濟價值的『俸祿』，爭取成為日本第一的大名吧。

發展的秘訣在於將契合度好的建築物建在一起，例如『蕎麥麵店＋天婦羅店』、『地藏菩薩＋帽傘店』等。

建造客棧後，歷史上的名人也許會在『各國漫遊之旅』、『驅鬼之旅』、『寺子屋修學旅行』中前來參觀。

戰國時代的忍者戰爭遊戲！！
是一款發展忍者村，進而一統天下的模擬類遊戲。

忍者村的村民（真實身份為忍者）們會向來訪的旅客兜售自製的商品以及從村裡採集到的木材和礦石來賺錢。賺來的錢可以作為軍費，用於村民的修行或是增強裝備和兵力，所以請好好經營村莊哦。

村民透過不斷修行可以學會各式各樣的技能，讓他們裝備上武器和鎧甲……
然後就去打開戰鬥的序幕吧。

還有可能遇到歷史名將！？
----
其它遊戲請透過關鍵字「Kairosoft」來進行搜索。https://kairopark.jp
還有支援移動設備/電腦的遊戲發展國物語等免費遊戲哦。

出發前往草原、寒冷地帶、叢林等地去探險，尋找動物！
來經營一座讓各種動物都能舒適生活，大受歡迎的動物園吧！

首日開張就馬上讓客人因可愛的動物而笑容滿面。
餵食肚子餓的動物，照顧牠們吧。

送禮物給還有點緊張的動物來增進彼此的感情應該也不錯喔。
依照動物的生態來選擇要送牠蘋果、樹果或肉類吧。
要是養殖場內的植物設置也能夠配合動物的生活環境就更棒了！

也別忘了讓客人逛得舒適喔！
若是有長椅和休息區域，再加上熱狗販售店的話就能讓客人玩到太陽下山了吧。
當動物園的區域變大後，引入園區巴士來讓移動變得更輕鬆！

當同一個養殖場內的動物彼此感情變好就會萌生戀情……還可能生下小孩子唷！
如果養殖場內只有雄性的話，就藉由探險或介紹所來幫牠們尋找雌性的夥伴吧。
動物可以透過緊張的雇用交涉而成為夥伴，要幫牠取一個專屬的名字喔。

於SNS上也大受世界矚目！來吧，靠你的經營技巧來朝五星級動物園邁進吧！

輕觸、拖曳、放大與縮小等操作方式皆可對應。

更多遊戲請搜尋「Kairosoft」。https://kairopark.jp
這裡有許多您可能玩過的免費遊戲，也有大量買斷制應用程式！
都是2D點陣圖風格的Kairosoft系列遊戲喔。

請跟隨我們的Twitter，以獲得最新資訊。
https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

mo.releaseNotes: 新增泰語、德語、法語，支持 8 種語言。
mo.description:
來打造充滿笑容與回憶的美好遊樂園吧！
首先要建造「旋轉咖啡杯」及「彈跳床」等設施來招攬遊客。再來招募人氣吉祥物並加以培育，讓他們參加盛裝遊行吧。

來訪的遊客或許會在社群網路平台上發表感想喔。
參考對遊樂園的感想或期望，並活用在經營上吧。
其中說不定會有因為看了知名評論家的感想而來訪的遊客喔？
想建造更多遊樂設施，就需要有土地。
盡情外包工程來擴大土地吧。
或許有朝一日，興建「摩天輪」及「雲霄飛車」等巨大遊樂設施也不是夢喔？
另外，整修交通機關可以讓遠方的遊客也來參訪。

而遊樂園最不可或缺的，就是身為門面的吉祥物。
透過每年一次的獲得交涉，來招募理想的吉祥物吧。
只要獲得新吉祥物，就會開放建造「雪國區」或「宇宙區」、「沙漠區」等符合吉祥物氛圍的遊樂區。如果人氣夠高，在參加盛裝遊行時，也會讓遊客滿意。

遊客滿足時就會累積點數，可以將此點數用在研究設施等指令上。
強化遊樂設施的人氣與性能來創造粉絲，並登上全國遊樂園排行榜吧。
要在遼闊土地上打造出怎樣的遊樂園，都在您一念之間！

一起來經營充滿許多遊客的夢幻主題遊樂園吧！
--
本作還支援觸控捲動及畫面的擴大縮小。

更多遊戲請搜尋「Kairosoft」。https://kairopark.jp
這裡有許多您可能玩過的免費遊戲，也有大量買斷制應用程式！

經營一家遊戲公司，達成百萬人氣。

這是大幅強化後的升級版，新增了在自己公司內部開發遊戲機的功能以及轉職系統。

找尋優秀職員並對他們進行培養吧。
培養公司職員後，可開發的遊戲種類和內容會變多。尋找出人氣組合，在新型主機上進行發售吧！不僅如此，程式員及音樂製作等與遊戲相關的職業系統也將登場。

成為遊戲界的霸者吧。
----

http://kairopark.jp

這是一款經營鐵路公司車站的模擬遊戲， 
自由配置各種設備，引進自己喜歡的列車吧。
設置必備的自動販賣機、長椅、指示牌來增加便利性，
設置便利店、壽司店、蕎麥麵店等店鋪來增加人氣。

連接車廂還能造出商務列車和觀光列車哦。
開發周邊地區後能夠吸引新的顧客前來。

通勤顧客和學生將絡繹不絕，屬於你的大型車站即將發車運轉！

mo.description:
來經營專屬於你的滑冰場吧。
還可以培育員工參加競技賽喔。

首先你要準備一個大型滑冰場來吸引客人。
在滑冰場上布置一些裝飾品增添魅力，讓大家不禁想要多拍幾張照。
設置「三溫暖」療癒身心；設置「熱湯吧」用熱湯紓解疲憊。
客人的迴響有時也會發上社群喔！

「要是有這種菜色就好了」
積極回應客人的要求吧！
你可以搭配各種材料開發出你的原創菜色。
運動後送上一頓美食，客人也會笑容滿面。

指導員的培育也很重要。
「旋轉」、「艾克索跳」……學會各種技巧後，
再編組一套最能發揮實力的演出節目去挑戰競技賽吧！
得到優勝的話，滑冰場的評價肯定也會跟著水漲船高！

打開知名度後，其他城鎮的鎮長也聞風而來。
這時就可以把滑冰場遷往更好的地點，吸引全世界的人來多多光顧囉！

來吧，一起打造五星滑冰場，讓客人們留下深刻回憶吧！

我們的應用實時連接到YouTube，讓您播放任何視頻，並擁有專為您設計的獨家功能！

• 循環模式：無限循環播放您喜歡的視頻。
此外還包括：

FyTube非常適合不想錯過任何喜歡主題視頻的用戶。
盡情探索、播放並享受您喜愛的內容——無干擾！

特別功能
浮動播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他應用時繼續觀看視頻。
只需進入全屏模式，點擊畫中畫按鈕——它是播放器頂部的第二個圖標。

鎖屏播放

啟用此功能後，視頻將在您設定的時間後自動停止。非常適合睡覺或小憩，無需擔心忘記關閉。

tw.description:
於 App Store 獨家上架，針對 iPad 量身打造，精心設計，提供強大功能 - Inspire Pro 可提供極速逼真的繪畫、繪圖與素描體驗，讓您隨身攜帶並於靈感迸發時，隨時隨地進行創作。

我們的專利繪圖引擎 Sorcery™ 充分運用 GPU 效能，讓筆觸擁有絢爛的 64 位元色彩、雷射般銳利的子像素精細度和極致高速。 濕潤的油畫筆觸看起來很漂亮，而幹筆劃驚人的混合效果同樣會完全讓你驚嘆。稍用一點力塗抹畫布，爲您的作品添加微妙的模糊效果，或者再用大點力將畫布上現有的顔色混合在一起，創造出新的色彩。 

不論是新秀藝術家、經驗豐富的專業人士或處於兩者之間的藝術工作者，皆可享有 iPad 上最直觀迷人之繪圖應用程式 Inspire Pro 的簡潔設計和強大功能。

畫筆
• 共有 150 種優質筆刷可供選擇 (分為 15 組)：油畫、噴槍、噴漆、顏料潑濺、石墨鉛筆、蠟筆、麥克筆、粉筆、炭筆、粉彩筆和炭精筆、基本圖形、複雜圖形、圖形外框、圖樣和紋理
• 所有畫筆均可用作濕刷、幹刷（混合）或擦除器
• 超過20種不同的背景可用于定制畫筆筆觸，功能强大、變化多樣。

油畫
• Sorcery™，App Store上最快的64位噴漆引擎
• 完整支援 Apple Pencil 壓力、傾斜角度、方向和雙擊功能
• 支援 Smart Keyboard，並提供 20 多組依使用情境而定的鍵盤快捷鍵
• 在iPad Pro上可創建尺寸最大爲16K（64MP）的畫布
• 雙紋理刷
• 64位彩色
• 始終支持所有設備情况 - 輕鬆地從人像切換到風景畫
• 可1000級撤消和重做
• 觸摸和滑動熱點可用于快速更改畫筆大小、不透明度和壓力，而無需打開菜單
• 可長按吸管工具，從畫布中選擇塗料顔色
• 畫布可以移動、旋轉和放大，最多可達6400％

畫布回放視頻錄製
• 自動記錄筆觸效果，隨時繪製
• 您可以直接在作品庫中播放你一筆一筆作畫的視頻
• 畫布回放視頻可以導出到您的照片或任何其他目的地
• 導出的視頻是高品質高清晰度的，分辨率高達1080p

拾色器
• 使用直觀的拾色器，選擇您喜歡的任何塗料顔色
• HSB（色調-飽和度-亮度）和RGB（紅綠藍）滑塊，伴隨著一個大色環、彩色方塊和不透明滑塊
• 在繪畫時，您最近使用的顔色會自動保存到調色板中
• 您還可以通過拖放將您喜愛的顔色保存到調色板中

訪問snowCanoe.com 查看更多截圖、視頻和圖稿。

妳還在為照片上不請自來的過客犯愁嗎？
使用照片橡皮擦，有瑕疵的照片瞬間修復，變成完美收藏。
照片橡皮擦可以輕松幫妳去除圖片上的電線、人物、圖標、水印、文字等等雜物，就和拍照壹樣簡單。
照片橡皮擦使用智能算法自動填補受損和缺失的區域，智能填充來到了妳的手機，P圖再也不需要壹臺電腦。
特點：
- 刪除多余的人物
- 擦除照片上的電線
- 擦除臉上的粉刺，黑痣
- 修復有劃痕的舊照片
- 去除照片上意外的移動物體
- 去除照片上的水印、日期等等等等
- 簡單易用

什麽，還有不能完成的其他P圖任務，看看我們的其他軟件，總有壹款能幫到妳：
• 輕松摳圖 - 史上最強摳圖神器.
• 色彩大師 - 改變照片顏色,黑白多彩特效.
• 美圖聚焦 - 虛化背景, 模糊背景, 美化照片, 突出運動健美的妳.
• 奇幻變臉秀 - 制作變臉動畫，照片變視頻，GIF圖片.

給我們壹個評論，幫助我們提高app的功能！

tw.description:
STEP UP TO THE PLATE
Relive the second baseball game in the Backyard Sports franchise, now enhanced to run on iOS. Whether you're picking your dream team, playing a pick-up game, or diving into a full season, step up to the plate and experience the game that made baseball fun for everyone!

Backyard Baseball ‘01 teams up the Backyard kids with Backyardified MLB legends. Create your own Backyard team, customize your uniforms, and strategize to win the Championship. Play a single pick-up game or play through an entire season. Backyard Baseball ‘01 features intuitive controls for all ages!

SWING BACK INTO BASEBALL
Enjoy baseball like it’s 2001!
30 Charming Backyard kids
Legendary MLB Players
MLB Team Marks
Hilarious Bloopers
8 Classic Ballparks
9 Pitching Power-ups and 4 batting Power-ups
Lively commentary from Sunny Day and Vinnie

To get into the swing of things, choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit the ball!

THE GOAT RETURNS
Play with the legend himself, Pablo Sanchez. Build a roster from a cast of 30 hilarious child athletes and 28 legendary pros that made Backyard Baseball ‘01 a sports classic. Returning MLB players include Derek Jeter, Alex Rodriguez, Cal Ripken Jr., Sammy Sosa, Mike Piazza, Randy Johnson, Nomar Garciaparra, Jeff Bagwell, Jason Giambi, Chipper Jones, Jeromy Burnitz, Mark McGwire, Shawn Green, Vladimir Guerrero, Kenny Lofton, Jason Kendall, Barry Larkin, Marty Cordova, Mo Vaughn, Raul Mondesi, Curt Schilling, Alex Gonzalez, Juan Gonzalez, Larry Walker, Carlos Beltran, Tony Gwynn, Ivan Rodriguez, and Jose Canseco.

Game Modes include:
Choose from three modes of play (Easy Mode, Medium Mode, Hard Mode)
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer choosing players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You pick your home field, create a team, and manage the team through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season, the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). If you keep winning, you’ll compete in the Super Entire Nation Tournament and Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series!

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. As an example, we can’t use the original 32bit code to support modern macOS, as even with an incredibly clever wrapper, macOS can’t execute the binaries.

Backyard Baseball ‘01 runs well, looks better than ever, includes new bonus features to test your mettle, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

tw.description:
「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

建造亮麗的江戶之城。
配置城堡和小巷，建立出大氣的城下町吧！

增加代表商店和居民經濟價值的『俸祿』，爭取成為日本第一的大名吧。

發展的秘訣在於將契合度好的建築物建在一起，例如『蕎麥麵店＋天婦羅店』、『地藏菩薩＋帽傘店』等。

建造客棧後，歷史上的名人也許會在『各國漫遊之旅』、『驅鬼之旅』、『寺子屋修學旅行』中前來參觀。

開闢江戶未來的也許就是正在瀏覽介紹的你！！

戰國時代的忍者戰爭遊戲！！
是一款發展忍者村，進而一統天下的模擬類遊戲。

忍者村的村民（真實身份為忍者）們會向來訪的旅客兜售自製的商品以及從村裡採集到的木材和礦石來賺錢。賺來的錢可以作為軍費，用於村民的修行或是增強裝備和兵力，所以請好好經營村莊哦。

村民透過不斷修行可以學會各式各樣的技能，讓他們裝備上武器和鎧甲……
然後就去打開戰鬥的序幕吧。

還有可能遇到歷史名將！？
----
其它遊戲請透過關鍵字「Kairosoft」來進行搜索。https://kairopark.jp
還有支援移動設備/電腦的遊戲發展國物語等免費遊戲哦。

出發前往草原、寒冷地帶、叢林等地去探險，尋找動物！
來經營一座讓各種動物都能舒適生活，大受歡迎的動物園吧！

首日開張就馬上讓客人因可愛的動物而笑容滿面。
餵食肚子餓的動物，照顧牠們吧。

送禮物給還有點緊張的動物來增進彼此的感情應該也不錯喔。
依照動物的生態來選擇要送牠蘋果、樹果或肉類吧。
要是養殖場內的植物設置也能夠配合動物的生活環境就更棒了！

也別忘了讓客人逛得舒適喔！
若是有長椅和休息區域，再加上熱狗販售店的話就能讓客人玩到太陽下山了吧。
當動物園的區域變大後，引入園區巴士來讓移動變得更輕鬆！

當同一個養殖場內的動物彼此感情變好就會萌生戀情……還可能生下小孩子唷！
如果養殖場內只有雄性的話，就藉由探險或介紹所來幫牠們尋找雌性的夥伴吧。
動物可以透過緊張的雇用交涉而成為夥伴，要幫牠取一個專屬的名字喔。

於SNS上也大受世界矚目！來吧，靠你的經營技巧來朝五星級動物園邁進吧！

輕觸、拖曳、放大與縮小等操作方式皆可對應。

來打造充滿笑容與回憶的美好遊樂園吧！
首先要建造「旋轉咖啡杯」及「彈跳床」等設施來招攬遊客。再來招募人氣吉祥物並加以培育，讓他們參加盛裝遊行吧。

來訪的遊客或許會在社群網路平台上發表感想喔。
參考對遊樂園的感想或期望，並活用在經營上吧。
其中說不定會有因為看了知名評論家的感想而來訪的遊客喔？
想建造更多遊樂設施，就需要有土地。
盡情外包工程來擴大土地吧。
或許有朝一日，興建「摩天輪」及「雲霄飛車」等巨大遊樂設施也不是夢喔？
另外，整修交通機關可以讓遠方的遊客也來參訪。

而遊樂園最不可或缺的，就是身為門面的吉祥物。
透過每年一次的獲得交涉，來招募理想的吉祥物吧。
只要獲得新吉祥物，就會開放建造「雪國區」或「宇宙區」、「沙漠區」等符合吉祥物氛圍的遊樂區。如果人氣夠高，在參加盛裝遊行時，也會讓遊客滿意。

遊客滿足時就會累積點數，可以將此點數用在研究設施等指令上。
強化遊樂設施的人氣與性能來創造粉絲，並登上全國遊樂園排行榜吧。
要在遼闊土地上打造出怎樣的遊樂園，都在您一念之間！

一起來經營充滿許多遊客的夢幻主題遊樂園吧！

us.description:
You are reading this text.
 But why?
 Are you looking for a game,
 or has the game found you?
 Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game.
 It is a simulation of creating a new reality.
 Will you shape faith,
 or will faith shape you?
 Humanity has always sought light in the darkness.
 It has always longed to believe in something greater,
 something that gives meaning to existence.
 That’s how religions were born –
 as beacons in the storms of history,
 as compasses in the ocean of life.
 What if you become the creator of a religion?
 What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality?
You are the Creator.
 You are the source.
 You are the inspiration.
 And if you are reading this text – you’re already in the game!
 All that’s left is to install – and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions!

 Become the source of faith – in the strategy simulator Religion Inc.

 Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness.

 There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity.

Game Features
*A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions!
*Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more!
*Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours!
*Hundreds of real-world religious aspects – and even more to come! Learn more about world religions!
*Unique active abilities for each archetype – perform miracles and change the world!
*Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy!

Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator – Religion Inc.

Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

us.description:
Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you!
Highlight Features:
• Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos’ audio in the background.
• Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos.
• Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free.
• Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat.
It also includes:
• Toggleable subtitles
• Playback speed control
• Quality selection and fullscreen mode
• Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search)
• Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year
FyTube is perfect for those who don’t want to miss a single video about their favorite topics.
Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest — interruption-free!

SPECIAL FEATURES
FLOATING PLAYBACK
Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps .
Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button — it’s the second icon at the top of the player.
Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open!

LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK
Listen without interruptions!
Keep enjoying your video’s audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing.
How to activate it?
Just lock your device screen. You’ll instantly see the background player.
Tap Play — and that’s it! The audio will keep going without pauses.

SLEEP TIMER
Fall asleep peacefully — your app will stop by itself!
Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything.
How to activate it?
Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that’s it.
Relax and let the app handle the rest!

LOOP MODE
Play your favorite video over and over again!
Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want.
How to know if it’s on?
The icon will turn red when active.
(VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it’s on or off.)
Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat!

us.description:
Available exclusively on the App Store, meticulously designed to be beautifully powerful, and painstakingly engineered for iPad — Inspire Pro delivers an incredibly fast and realistic painting, drawing, and sketching experience that you can take with you wherever you go and use whenever inspiration strikes.

Our proprietary painting engine Sorcery™ takes full advantage of the GPU to render brush strokes with brilliant 64-bit color, laser-sharp sub-pixel precision, and insanely fast speed. While the strokes of a wet oil paint brush look beautiful on their own, the breathtaking blending effects of a dry brush will absolutely stun you. Graze the canvas with just a bit of pressure to add a subtle blur to your artwork or use stronger pressure to actually mix existing colors on the canvas together to create new ones.

Whether you are a budding artist, seasoned professional, or somewhere in-between, you will enjoy the simplicity and power of the most intuitive and compelling illustration app for iPad, Inspire Pro.

Amazing Brushes
• 150 high quality brushes to choose from, divided into 15 sets: Oil Paint, Airbrushes, Spray Paint, Paint Splatter, Graphite Pencils, Wax Crayons, Markers, Chalk, Charcoal, Pastels & Conté, Basic Shapes, Complex Shapes, Shape Outlines, Patterns, and Textures
• All brushes can be used as a Wet Brush, Dry Brush (Blending), or Eraser
• Over 20 different settings are available to customize brush strokes with powerful versatility and variation

The Best Painting App for iPad
• Sorcery™, the fastest 64-bit painting engine on the App Store
• Full-fledged Apple Pencil support for pressure, tilt angle, orientation, and double-tap
• Smart Keyboard support with over 20 context-sensitive keyboard shortcuts
• Create a canvas of any size up to 16K (64MP) on iPad Pro
• Dual-texture brushes
• 64-bit color
• All device orientations are supported all the time — switch from portrait to landscape painting with ease
• 1000 levels of undo and redo are available
• Touch and slide hotspots can be used to quickly change brush size, opacity, and pressure without opening a menu
• The eyedropper tool can be used with a touch and hold gesture to select paint colors from the canvas
• The canvas can be moved around, rotated, and zoomed in and out up to 6400%

Canvas Playback Video Recording
• Brush strokes are automatically recorded as you paint without any delay
• You can play the video of your artwork being created stroke-by-stroke directly in the gallery
• Exported videos are high quality HD at up to 1080p resolution

Full-Featured Color Picker
• Choose any paint color you can dream of with the intuitive color picker
• HSB and RGB sliders accompany a large color circle, color square, and opacity slider
• Your latest colors are saved to a palette automatically while you paint
• You can also save your favorite colors to a palette with drag and drop

Visit snowCanoe.com to check out more screenshots, videos, and artwork.

us.description:
STEP UP TO THE PLATE
Relive the second baseball game in the Backyard Sports franchise, now enhanced to run on iOS. Whether you're picking your dream team, playing a pick-up game, or diving into a full season, step up to the plate and experience the game that made baseball fun for everyone!

Backyard Baseball ‘01 teams up the Backyard kids with Backyardified MLB legends. Create your own Backyard team, customize your uniforms, and strategize to win the Championship. Play a single pick-up game or play through an entire season. Backyard Baseball ‘01 features intuitive controls for all ages!

SWING BACK INTO BASEBALL
Enjoy baseball like it’s 2001!
30 Charming Backyard kids
Legendary MLB Players
MLB Team Marks
Hilarious Bloopers
8 Classic Ballparks
9 Pitching Power-ups and 4 batting Power-ups
Lively commentary from Sunny Day and Vinnie

To get into the swing of things, choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit the ball!

THE GOAT RETURNS
Play with the legend himself, Pablo Sanchez. Build a roster from a cast of 30 hilarious child athletes and 28 legendary pros that made Backyard Baseball ‘01 a sports classic. Returning MLB players include Derek Jeter, Alex Rodriguez, Cal Ripken Jr., Sammy Sosa, Mike Piazza, Randy Johnson, Nomar Garciaparra, Jeff Bagwell, Jason Giambi, Chipper Jones, Jeromy Burnitz, Mark McGwire, Shawn Green, Vladimir Guerrero, Kenny Lofton, Jason Kendall, Barry Larkin, Marty Cordova, Mo Vaughn, Raul Mondesi, Curt Schilling, Alex Gonzalez, Juan Gonzalez, Larry Walker, Carlos Beltran, Tony Gwynn, Ivan Rodriguez, and Jose Canseco.

Game Modes include:
Choose from three modes of play (Easy Mode, Medium Mode, Hard Mode)
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer choosing players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You pick your home field, create a team, and manage the team through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season, the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). If you keep winning, you’ll compete in the Super Entire Nation Tournament and Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series!

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. As an example, we can’t use the original 32bit code to support modern macOS, as even with an incredibly clever wrapper, macOS can’t execute the binaries.

Backyard Baseball ‘01 runs well, looks better than ever, includes new bonus features to test your mettle, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

us.releaseNotes: 修复创建笔记页面保存按钮溢出问题。
us.description:
「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

Plunge into the past for a rousing romp through Edo period Japan! Your ideal samurai town awaits you!

Erect houses, castles, and all manner of medieval marvels with a touch of the finger--rewriting the pages of history as you see fit!

Strategically place compatible buildings to make "combos," boosting your Yield to become the best castle town in all the land!

---- 

Turn your device to rotate the screen, touch to scroll, and pinch to zoom in and out. 

Supports iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad. 
Note: Screen rotation and zoom are only available on iPhone 3GS and later, iPod touch 2nd generation and later, and iPad. 

The game now lets you switch between English and Japanese.

Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!

Rewrite the history of feudal Japan with an army of the ultimate guerrilla warriors: ninjas!

The shogun has fallen from power, plunging the land into chaos as feuding feudal lords scramble to take his place. But the shogun has an ace up his sleeve: you! As the head of a leading ninja clan, it's up to you to rally your followers and help unify Japan!

As their fearless leader, you'll need to train your fellow ninjas in the ways of modern 16th-century warfare--including the use of those newfangled matchlock guns! Assign them to infantry, cavalry, and other units to form an army fit for a shogun!

Of course, war is costly in more ways than one. Between battles, your followers will raise funds by producing food, handicrafts, and other goods to sell to passing travellers.

Arm your ninjas with the best gear, training, and skills and lead them to victory in the struggle for unification! You may even meet some of the era's greatest generals along the way...

---
Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!

Ready to build the zoo of your dreams? Depart on wild adventures to find exotic fauna, exploring all manner of environments from savanna to tundra, jungle and beyond! Give your new animal friends a home and take your zoo to the top of the industry!

Savor the thrill of opening day. Feed the animals in your burgeoning lineup—even give them the occasional treat to show you care! From apples to acorns, meat, and more, tailor your critters' diet according to their natural habitat. On that note, do the same with the surrounding flora too!

Your customers will also require expert care. Develop your zoo's infrastructure, installing benches, fountains, and the odd hot dog stand to make sure zoo-goers stay satisfied till close. Propel your place to mega-park proportions and you'll even be able to start an on-site shuttle!

What's more, if you're lucky, two of your critters who share the same pen may find romance—resulting in the grand gift of life! Potential partners can be found via the Animal Hub or when out exploring. But be forewarned; the latter method requires animals be won over through a heated battle of negotiation!

Well, what are you waiting for? Build a top-ranking zoo, set social media ablaze, and show the world your wild side!

Supports drag to scroll and pinch to zoom.

Search for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp
Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!
Kairosoft's pixel art game series continues!

Follow us on Twitter for the latest Kairosoft news and information.
https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

us.description:
Throw open the gates to a magical kingdom of fun and thrills!

Create and customize your own amusement park. From humble attractions like the teacup ride or trampolines, you'll be able to build up to bigger and better things. You can even hire mascots and hold fantastic parades!

What do your visitors like best? How can you improve? There's no better place to check up-to-the-minute feedback than the park's social media. Work hard, and you might attract the attention of famous online influencers!

Running out of space to build new rides? No problem! Just call your friendly neighborhood construction company to expand the park grounds. Soon you'll be setting up Ferris wheels, roller coasters, and other large-scale attractions to catch the eyes of prospective customers passing by.

Don't forget about mascots - these cute and quirky characters are the first things people will think of when they talk about your park! You'll be able to scout a new mascot every year. Signing one will give you access to special themed areas, like the the Space Zone, Snow Zone, and Desert Zone. Keep increasing your popularity and delight your visitors with spectacular parades!

The more impressed your visitors are, the more points you'll earn. These can be used to research new attractions and fixtures or add new functions to existing ones. Give your fans an experience they'll never forget and work your way up through the rankings!

Take your first step on the roller coaster ride of amusement park management! What kind of park will YOU create?
--
Supports drag to scroll and pinch to zoom.

Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp
Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!
Kairosoft's pixel art game series continues!

Follow us on Twitter for the latest Kairosoft news and information.
https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

Manage your own game company and try to create a million-selling game in this unique simulation.

Features the ability to develop your company's own game console, plus a system for changing your staff members' professions.

Hire talented people and train them to develop their skills.

As your staff gets more experience, you will unlock a wider array of game genres and content to develop. Try to find the most popular combinations and develop for the latest platform!
Your staff members can have a variety of game-related professions, from programmer to sound engineer.

Work hard and you may reach the top of the video game industry!
--
Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. 
Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!

https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

All aboard this exciting journey to build the world's greatest train station!

Customize your station with your favorite facilities and trains. Help your passengers travel in comfort by adding vending machines, benches, information boards and more. With fun features including arcades, VIP lounges and taco stands, you'll soon be everyone's favorite stop!

Link different carriages to create new trains for business, tourism and more. Expand into the surrounding area to attract new passengers.

It's full steam ahead for your spectacular new station! Watch as it fills with commuters, students and other travelers!

--------------------------------------------------------
All game progress is stored on your device. Save data cannot be restored after deleting or reinstalling the app.

Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!


Follow us on X(Twitter) for the latest news!
https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

us.releaseNotes: Now available in English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese and Korean!
us.description:
Let the elegant sound of carefully sharpened metal on meticulously maintained ice ring through your ears as you manage your very own ice skating rink. Train up your eager staff and enter them into competitions.

But first things first—you're going to need a huge rink, a place where your customers can glide with glee. And you never know when a carefully placed object on the ice may lead to an impromptu photoshoot.

Make sure your skaters are warm and happy off the ice with a heated room and soup bar. Some people might even post their experiences on social media, too!

Keep customers coming back by listening to their requests, like increasing the food choices at your rink. And with the right combination, who knows what amazing dishes you may discover! You can't skate on an empty stomach, after all!

You're also going to need a capable instructor or two to teach skaters all kinds of amazing tricks and bring out their full potential! And once they master the basics, have them create a figure-skating program and enter competitions! Their success on the ice will mean more business for your rink!

Looks like even the mayor from the town over has heard about your rink and come to check it out for themselves! With this kind of popularity, it won't be long until you have people coming from all over the world!

Now, get ready to create countless wonderful memories with your skaters, and aim to turn your rink into an unforgettable, 5-star facility!

Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!

To take your experience to the next level, we present three amazing new features:
• Enhanced VoiceOver: clearer and more detailed descriptions to make the app easier to use for our visually impaired users.
• Smart predictive search: find what you’re looking for in seconds thanks to real-time suggestions.

tr.description:
Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you!
Highlight Features:
• Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos’ audio in the background.
• Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos.
• Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free.
• Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat.
It also includes:
• Toggleable subtitles
• Playback speed control
• Quality selection and fullscreen mode
• Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search)
• Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year
FyTube is perfect for those who don’t want to miss a single video about their favorite topics.
Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest — interruption-free!

SPECIAL FEATURES
FLOATING PLAYBACK
Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps .
Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button — it’s the second icon at the top of the player.
Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open!

LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK
Listen without interruptions!
Keep enjoying your video’s audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing.
How to activate it?
Just lock your device screen. You’ll instantly see the background player.
Tap Play — and that’s it! The audio will keep going without pauses.

SLEEP TIMER
Fall asleep peacefully — your app will stop by itself!
Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything.
How to activate it?
Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that’s it.
Relax and let the app handle the rest!

LOOP MODE
Play your favorite video over and over again!
Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want.
How to know if it’s on?
The icon will turn red when active.
(VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it’s on or off.)
Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat!
Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube

BASIC FEATURES
• Fullscreen high-quality video playback
• Easy-to-use interface, friendly design
• Skip forward or rewind anytime — never miss the best parts
• Subtitle activation
• Adjust playback speed to your preference
• Change video quality
• Smart search with real-time suggestions and upload date filters: day, week, month, year, all
• Each video includes a related videos section to discover more interesting content
• Discover the latest videos and stay up to date with the news
• Our app connects directly to YouTube, letting you find any video
• Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device
• VoiceOver compatible (enhanced descriptions)
• No account required
• We don’t store cache, cookies, or personal data without your permission — watch safely
• Interface available in 29 languages
• NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS
Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience — ad-free and subscription-free.

Minimum Requirements:
• iOS 13 or later
• 3G connection or higher

Privacy Policy:
https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube
Terms of Service:
https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube

Visit fydub.com/fytube or write to us — we’ll be happy to help. We reply to all emails: fytube@fydub.com

tr.description:
STEP UP TO THE PLATE
Relive the second baseball game in the Backyard Sports franchise, now enhanced to run on iOS. Whether you're picking your dream team, playing a pick-up game, or diving into a full season, step up to the plate and experience the game that made baseball fun for everyone!

Backyard Baseball ‘01 teams up the Backyard kids with Backyardified MLB legends. Create your own Backyard team, customize your uniforms, and strategize to win the Championship. Play a single pick-up game or play through an entire season. Backyard Baseball ‘01 features intuitive controls for all ages!

SWING BACK INTO BASEBALL
Enjoy baseball like it’s 2001!
30 Charming Backyard kids
Legendary MLB Players
MLB Team Marks
Hilarious Bloopers
8 Classic Ballparks
9 Pitching Power-ups and 4 batting Power-ups
Lively commentary from Sunny Day and Vinnie

To get into the swing of things, choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit the ball!

THE GOAT RETURNS
Play with the legend himself, Pablo Sanchez. Build a roster from a cast of 30 hilarious child athletes and 28 legendary pros that made Backyard Baseball ‘01 a sports classic. Returning MLB players include Derek Jeter, Alex Rodriguez, Cal Ripken Jr., Sammy Sosa, Mike Piazza, Randy Johnson, Nomar Garciaparra, Jeff Bagwell, Jason Giambi, Chipper Jones, Jeromy Burnitz, Mark McGwire, Shawn Green, Vladimir Guerrero, Kenny Lofton, Jason Kendall, Barry Larkin, Marty Cordova, Mo Vaughn, Raul Mondesi, Curt Schilling, Alex Gonzalez, Juan Gonzalez, Larry Walker, Carlos Beltran, Tony Gwynn, Ivan Rodriguez, and Jose Canseco.

Game Modes include:
Choose from three modes of play (Easy Mode, Medium Mode, Hard Mode)
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer choosing players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You pick your home field, create a team, and manage the team through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season, the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). If you keep winning, you’ll compete in the Super Entire Nation Tournament and Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series!

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
At our core, we are fans first – not just of video games, but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver.

Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. As an example, we can’t use the original 32bit code to support modern macOS, as even with an incredibly clever wrapper, macOS can’t execute the binaries.

Backyard Baseball ‘01 runs well, looks better than ever, includes new bonus features to test your mettle, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the game.

tr.releaseNotes: 修复创建笔记页面保存按钮溢出问题。
tr.description:
「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

Plunge into the past for a rousing romp through Edo period Japan! Your ideal samurai town awaits you!

Erect houses, castles, and all manner of medieval marvels with a touch of the finger--rewriting the pages of history as you see fit!

Strategically place compatible buildings to make "combos," boosting your Yield to become the best castle town in all the land!

---- 

Turn your device to rotate the screen, touch to scroll, and pinch to zoom in and out. 

Supports iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad. 
Note: Screen rotation and zoom are only available on iPhone 3GS and later, iPod touch 2nd generation and later, and iPad. 

The game now lets you switch between English and Japanese.

Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!

Rewrite the history of feudal Japan with an army of the ultimate guerrilla warriors: ninjas!

The shogun has fallen from power, plunging the land into chaos as feuding feudal lords scramble to take his place. But the shogun has an ace up his sleeve: you! As the head of a leading ninja clan, it's up to you to rally your followers and help unify Japan!

As their fearless leader, you'll need to train your fellow ninjas in the ways of modern 16th-century warfare--including the use of those newfangled matchlock guns! Assign them to infantry, cavalry, and other units to form an army fit for a shogun!

Of course, war is costly in more ways than one. Between battles, your followers will raise funds by producing food, handicrafts, and other goods to sell to passing travellers.

Arm your ninjas with the best gear, training, and skills and lead them to victory in the struggle for unification! You may even meet some of the era's greatest generals along the way...

---
Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!

Ready to build the zoo of your dreams? Depart on wild adventures to find exotic fauna, exploring all manner of environments from savanna to tundra, jungle and beyond! Give your new animal friends a home and take your zoo to the top of the industry!

Savor the thrill of opening day. Feed the animals in your burgeoning lineup—even give them the occasional treat to show you care! From apples to acorns, meat, and more, tailor your critters' diet according to their natural habitat. On that note, do the same with the surrounding flora too!

Your customers will also require expert care. Develop your zoo's infrastructure, installing benches, fountains, and the odd hot dog stand to make sure zoo-goers stay satisfied till close. Propel your place to mega-park proportions and you'll even be able to start an on-site shuttle!

What's more, if you're lucky, two of your critters who share the same pen may find romance—resulting in the grand gift of life! Potential partners can be found via the Animal Hub or when out exploring. But be forewarned; the latter method requires animals be won over through a heated battle of negotiation!

Well, what are you waiting for? Build a top-ranking zoo, set social media ablaze, and show the world your wild side!

Supports drag to scroll and pinch to zoom.

Search for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp
Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!
Kairosoft's pixel art game series continues!

tr.description:
Throw open the gates to a magical kingdom of fun and thrills!

Create and customize your own amusement park. From humble attractions like the teacup ride or trampolines, you'll be able to build up to bigger and better things. You can even hire mascots and hold fantastic parades!

What do your visitors like best? How can you improve? There's no better place to check up-to-the-minute feedback than the park's social media. Work hard, and you might attract the attention of famous online influencers!

Running out of space to build new rides? No problem! Just call your friendly neighborhood construction company to expand the park grounds. Soon you'll be setting up Ferris wheels, roller coasters, and other large-scale attractions to catch the eyes of prospective customers passing by.

Don't forget about mascots - these cute and quirky characters are the first things people will think of when they talk about your park! You'll be able to scout a new mascot every year. Signing one will give you access to special themed areas, like the the Space Zone, Snow Zone, and Desert Zone. Keep increasing your popularity and delight your visitors with spectacular parades!

The more impressed your visitors are, the more points you'll earn. These can be used to research new attractions and fixtures or add new functions to existing ones. Give your fans an experience they'll never forget and work your way up through the rankings!

Take your first step on the roller coaster ride of amusement park management! What kind of park will YOU create?
--
Supports drag to scroll and pinch to zoom.

Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp

Manage your own game company and try to create a million-selling game in this unique simulation.

Features the ability to develop your company's own game console, plus a system for changing your staff members' professions.

Hire talented people and train them to develop their skills.

As your staff gets more experience, you will unlock a wider array of game genres and content to develop. Try to find the most popular combinations and develop for the latest platform!
Your staff members can have a variety of game-related professions, from programmer to sound engineer.

Work hard and you may reach the top of the video game industry!
--
Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. 
Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!

https://twitter.com/kairokun2010

All aboard this exciting journey to build the world's greatest train station!

Customize your station with your favorite facilities and trains. Help your passengers travel in comfort by adding vending machines, benches, information boards and more. With fun features including arcades, VIP lounges and taco stands, you'll soon be everyone's favorite stop!

Link different carriages to create new trains for business, tourism and more. Expand into the surrounding area to attract new passengers.

It's full steam ahead for your spectacular new station! Watch as it fills with commuters, students and other travelers!

--------------------------------------------------------

tr.description:
Let the elegant sound of carefully sharpened metal on meticulously maintained ice ring through your ears as you manage your very own ice skating rink. Train up your eager staff and enter them into competitions.

But first things first—you're going to need a huge rink, a place where your customers can glide with glee. And you never know when a carefully placed object on the ice may lead to an impromptu photoshoot.

Make sure your skaters are warm and happy off the ice with a heated room and soup bar. Some people might even post their experiences on social media, too!

Keep customers coming back by listening to their requests, like increasing the food choices at your rink. And with the right combination, who knows what amazing dishes you may discover! You can't skate on an empty stomach, after all!

You're also going to need a capable instructor or two to teach skaters all kinds of amazing tricks and bring out their full potential! And once they master the basics, have them create a figure-skating program and enter competitions! Their success on the ice will mean more business for your rink!

Looks like even the mayor from the town over has heard about your rink and come to check it out for themselves! With this kind of popularity, it won't be long until you have people coming from all over the world!

Now, get ready to create countless wonderful memories with your skaters, and aim to turn your rink into an unforgettable, 5-star facility!

Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games, or visit us at https://kairopark.jp. Be sure to check out both our free-to-play and our paid games!
